Description: On I-81 South at mile marker 266.1 in the County of Shenandoah, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. Traffic backups are approximately 2.0 miles.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On US-50 East in the County of Loudoun, in the vicinity of St Louis Rd; Rt. 611N/S (Loudoun County), motorists can expect delays due to weather. Lane closures exist.
Label: Weather Incident - Other Weather - Advisory

Description: On I-664 at mile marker 6.3 in the City of Newport News, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
